cs.CR, cs.LO, cs.IT, cs.SE, cs.PL 

The paper deals with the concept of information erasure, which is a topic in computer security (cs.CR). It also involves formal modeling and requirements, which are topics in logic and computation (cs.LO). The paper also discusses the composition of systems, which is a topic in software engineering (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper involves information theory (cs.IT) and programming languages (cs.PL) in its discussion of erasure-friendly requirements.
